mapper.insert: insert into shelterAnimal_board (desertionNo, popfile, happenDt, kindCd, orgNm, happenPlace, specialMark, careNm, careTel, careAddr, processState) select #{desertionNo}, #{popfile}, #{happenDt}, #{kindCd}, #{orgNm}, #{happenPlace}, #{specialMark}, #{careNm}, #{careTel}, #{careAddr}, #{processState} from dual where not exists(select * from shelterAnimal_board where desertionNo = #{desertionNo})
